# z-toast-notification-list

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                             | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Default                                |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `newestontop` | `newestontop` | Set the entry position of new notification in the list                                                                  | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `true`                                 |
| `position`    | `position`    | Set the position of toast notification list - top-left, top-centre, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-centre, bottom-right | `ToastNotificationPositions.BOTTOM_CENTRE \| ToastNotificationPositions.BOTTOM_LEFT \| ToastNotificationPositions.BOTTOM_RIGHT \| ToastNotificationPositions.TOP_CENTRE \| ToastNotificationPositions.TOP_LEFT \| ToastNotificationPositions.TOP_RIGHT` | `ToastNotificationPositions.TOP_RIGHT` |
